Language.Text:
Oppressive heat surrounds you, radiating from plasma conduits protruding from most surfaces. You find it difficult to breathe, but the inhabitants of the station seem unaffected. They move deliberately and with a sense of urgency, paying no attention to you.
The Xortek corporation logo on the holodisplay on the wall is the only thing greeting you in this hadean place.

The entryway to the phased smelting works is blocked by a very large man, his arms encased in a powered exoskeleton. Sweat drips from his large mustache. He turns his eyes towards you, but makes no effort to speak. You ask if you can enter, but get no response. You turn to leave. The man's eyes follow you as a bead of sweat rolls down his brow.

The darkened hall is sparsely populated by pilots of the docked ships. Some glance at you and smirk. A woman approaches you. Lower half of her face and neck are covered with horrible burn scars. She speaks through her cyber-larynx:
"Xortek Corporation has a bonus plan that is unrivaled in Human space."
Her eyes glow dimly, like dying embers devoid of a source of fuel. She sighs:
"Sadly, we have no tasks available for you at this time."
A massive door blocks your way. On its side is a terminal requesting authorization... which you do not have. You turn away and leave.

You approach a mechanic. She looks at you, your ship and then her datapad. She is profusely sweating. She unsticks her lips to say:
"Sorry captain, dock services are only available to corporation mercenaries with good standing. Please see the liason on level 233 for more information."

The liason glances at her data pad:
"Ah! Your services to the Xortek Corporation have been exemplary! I am happy to invite you to use our smelting works, as well as dock services. We look forward to working with you in the future."
